short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bust those terrible, terrible caches at will.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bust the caches so you get the latest version of the page.

Guaranteed to work on every website in the galaxy!*

Never wait around for the freshest content again!

*Statement is patently false.
